name: running
desc: leaning into a sprint head down

name: looking upward
desc: shielding eyes with hand gazing up

name: hands on hips
desc: one hand on hip weight offset

name: talking on a phone
desc: phone pressed to ear hand gesturing

name: eating a snack
desc: hand halfway to mouth casual grip

name: taking a selfie
desc: arm extended high chin angled down

name: carrying a bag
desc: shoulder dipped under weight of bag

name: examining equipment
desc: leaning in close examining surface details

name: resting/exhausted
desc: leaning forward hands bracing on knees

name: waiting/impatient

name: leaning

name: stiff/sore
desc: stretching neck head tilted to side
